text: namut “(pratikṣēpa karana) ovunva (obagē janatāva) oba kapā damanu. nætahot oba, obagē nivasin (piṭa raṭakaṭa) piṭatva yanu”yayi api ovunṭa niyama kara tibuṇahot ovungen samahareku hæra, (væḍi deneku) mesē karannēma næta. ehet ovun siyallanma tamanṭa upades dī æti paridi kara tibuṇē nam, eya ovunṭama itāmat aganā dæyak bavaṭa patva tikhennaṭa iḍa tibuṇi. tavada (viśvāsayehi ovunva) sthīra karannaṭada iḍa tibuṇi
